name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Get a pot of water and bring it to boil
Put the Spaghetti in the pot
Let them cook and stir from time to time
In the meantime, mix the cream, the eggs, salt and pepper
put the mixture in a pan and bring it to temperature
don't make it to hot, the eggs shouldn't coagulate
once the spaghetti are done, sieve the spaghetti and put it back in the pot
put the butter in the pan with the spaghetti
put the parmesan in the pan with the sauce and stir
get plates and serve
